input.sentences: the bikers began the steep climb .
they all knew there could be only one victor .
coming in second place he was n't very happy with his performance .
the jubilant smile of the victor can not be faked .
output.sentences: The bikers race each other as they climb up the steep and dangerous hill.
Now, the bikers are close to the finish, victory is in sight.
At last, the bikers cross the finish line.
First place poses in front of the camera, happy with his effort.
Second place smiles with jubilance in front of the camera.
